語音: (ごおん) - the sound of a word
語頭: (ごとう) - first part of a word
誠: (sei/makoto) - sincerity , truth, reality; sincerity, honesty, integrity, fidelity
誠しやか: (まことしやか) - plausible (e.g. of a rumour); believable (e.g. of a story); specious (e.g. of an argument); credible (e.g. of a lie); looking very like the truth
誠しやかに: (まことしやかに) - as if it were true; with seeming truth; plausibly
誠に: (makotoni) - de fato, realmente, absolutamente, verdadeiramente, na verdade, muito, bastante
誠にもって: (まことにもって) - in all sincerity; truthfully; honestly
誠を尽くす: (まことをつくす) - to do with sincerity
誠心誠意: (せいしんせいい) - (yoji) in all sincerity; with one's whole heart; whole-hearted devotion
誠照寺派: (じょうしょうじは) - Joushouji sect (of Shin Buddhism)
誡め: (いましめ) - caution/admonition/warning/lesson; (also written as 禁め) prohibition/ban/commandment/precept; punishment; caution/guard
誡める: (いましめる) - to admonish/to warn/to remonstrate; to prohibit/to forbid; to be cautious; to punish
誣いる: (しいる) - to slander; to accuse falsely
誤ち: (あやまち) - fault; error; indiscretion; faux pas
誤って: (あやまって) - in error; by mistake; by accident
誤りに陥る: (あやまりにおちいる) - to fall into error
誤りを犯す: (あやまりをおかす) - to make a mistake; to commit an error; to commit a fault
誤りを直す: (あやまりをなおす) - to correct an error
誤りを認める: (あやまりをみとめる) - to admit to a mistake
誤りバースト: (あやまりバースト) - error burst
誤り伝える: (あやまりつたえる) - to misrepresent; to distort; to belie
誤り制御: (あやまりせいぎょ) - error control
誤り制御ソフトウェア: (あやまりせいぎょソフトウェア) - error control software
誤り回復: (あやまりかいふく) - error recovery
誤り検出: (あやまりけんしゅつ) - error detection
誤り検出符号: (あやまりけんしゅつふごう) - error-detecting code; self-checking code
誤り状態: (あやまりじょうたい) - error condition (in calculators)
誤り表示: (あやまりひょうじ) - error indication
誤り訂正: (あやまりていせい) - error correction
誤り訂正符号: (あやまりていせいふごう) - error-correcting code
誤る: (あやまる) - to make a mistake/to err; to mislead/to misguide
誤使用: (ごしよう) - improper use; wrong use; misuse; mishandling; abuse
誤判: (ごはん) - misjudgement; misjudgment; erroneous judgement; miscarriage of justice
誤嚥: (ごえん) - breathing in (of a foreign body, food, etc.); pulmonary aspiration; mis-swallowing; swallowing down the wrong pipe
誤字: (ごじ) - misprint; misspelling; typo; typographical error; erratum
誤差拡散法: (ごさかくさんほう) - random dither
誤挿入: (ごそうにゅう) - incorrect insertion (of equipment, unit, part)
誤摩化す: (ごまかす) - to deceive/to falsify/to misrepresent/to cheat/to swindle/to tamper/to juggle/to manipulate; to dodge/to beg the question (issue, difficulties); to varnish over/to gloss over
誤爆: (ごばく) - bombing (shelling) the wrong target; (be killed by) friendly fire
誤用: (ごよう) - misuse; incorrect use; abuse; malapropism
誤表記: (ごひょうき) - mistaken way of writing something; mistaken spelling; wrong way of writing something; wrong spelling
誤認識: (ごにんしき) - misrecognition; mistaking (x for y)
誤認逮捕: (ごにんたいほ) - mistaken arrest; arrest based on misidentification
誤謬推理: (ごびゅうすいり) - fallacy (sometimes esp. a paralogism)
誤達: (ごたつ) - delivery to the wrong house or person (email, postal items, etc.); false notification; mistaken notification; notifying somebody incorrectly
誤飲: (ごいん) - accidental ingestion; swallowing something by mistake
誤魔かす: (ごまかす) - to deceive/to falsify/to misrepresent/to cheat/to swindle/to tamper/to juggle/to manipulate; to dodge/to beg the question (issue, difficulties); to varnish over/to gloss over
誤魔化し: (ごまかし) - hanky-panky; juggling; cheating; deception; smoke and mirrors
誤魔化す: (ごまかす) - to deceive/to falsify/to misrepresent/to cheat/to swindle/to tamper/to juggle/to manipulate; to dodge/to beg the question (issue, difficulties); to varnish over/to gloss over
誦す: (ずす) - to recite; to chant; to read aloud
誦する: (ずする) - to recite; to chant; to read aloud
誦経: (ずきょう) - chanting or reading the sutras
